name: Savora: Culinary Spot
desc: Savora is a culinary platform contains resto list, food menu, cuisines, cities, and dashboard features based on web. The project was developed for fun using React, Laravel, Tailwind CSS, MySQL, and others.
css: bg-green-400/10 text-green-400 dark:text-blue-600 dark:bg-slate-100 dark:border dark:border-blue-600

name: Wordium: Writing Platform
desc: Wordium is a writing platform contains story, knowledge, and perspective, post submit and edit features based on web. The project was developed for practicing Laravel and CRUD using Blade, Laravel, Tailwind CSS, MySQL, and others.
css: bg-blue-400/10 text-blue-400 dark:text-blue-600 dark:bg-slate-100 dark:border dark:border-blue-600

name: NoTimeToNews: News Portal
desc: NoTimeToNews is a news portal contains highlight and daily news, news submit and edit features based on web. The project was developed for practicing React and CRUD using React, Laravel, Tailwind CSS, MySQL, and others.
css: bg-yellow-400/10 text-yellow-400 dark:text-blue-600 dark:bg-slate-100 dark:border dark:border-blue-600

name: Proteus: Post Hub
desc: Proteus is a post hub contains posts and users information and detail, post and user submit and edit features based on web. The project was developed for practicing React and fetch API using React, Axios, Tailwind CSS, and others.
css: bg-sky-400/10 text-sky-300 dark:text-blue-600 dark:bg-slate-100 dark:border dark:border-blue-600
